00023 #include "FileOutput.h"

00026 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00027 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_exceptions;
00028 using namespace std;

00034 {
00035 }

00044 /*
00045  * Read the data file and cache the data headers.
00046  */
00047 void DataSetUpdater::Initialize(const char *file)
00048 {
00049         fileName = file;
00050         GenericData data;
00051         GenericFileReader reader;
00052         reader.SetFilename(fileName);
00053         reader.Open(data);
00054 
00055         int ng = data.Header().GetDataGroupCnt();
00056         positions.resize(ng);
00057         rowsizes.resize(ng);
00058         colsizes.resize(ng);
00059     dataSetNames.resize(ng);
00060         for (int ig=0; ig<ng; ig++)
00061         {
00062                 DataGroupHeader &dgHdr = data.Header().GetDataGroup(ig);
00063                 int ns = dgHdr.GetDataSetCnt();
00064                 positions[ig].resize(ns);
00065                 rowsizes[ig].resize(ns);
00066                 colsizes[ig].resize(ns);
00067         dataSetNames[ig].resize(ns);
00068                 for (int is=0; is<ns; is++)
00069                 {
00070                         DataSetHeader &dsHdr = dgHdr.GetDataSet(is);
00071                         positions[ig][is] = dsHdr.GetDataStartFilePos();
00072                         rowsizes[ig][is] = dsHdr.GetRowSize();
00073             dataSetNames[ig][is] = dsHdr.GetName();
00074 
00075                         int nc = dsHdr.GetColumnCnt();
00076                         colsizes[ig][is].resize(nc);
00077                         for (int ic=0; ic<nc; ic++)
00078                                 colsizes[ig][is][ic] = dsHdr.GetColumnInfo(ic).GetSize();
00079                 }
00080         }
00081         reader.Close();
00082 }
00083 
00084 void DataSetUpdater::SeekToPosition(ofstream &os, int groupIndex, int setIndex, int row, int col)
00085 {
00086         int pos = positions[groupIndex][setIndex] + (row*rowsizes[groupIndex][setIndex]);
00087         for (int i=0; i<col; i++)
00088                 pos += colsizes[groupIndex][setIndex][i];
00089         os.seekp(pos, std::ios::beg);
00090 }
00091 
00092 /*
00093  * Seek to the position and update the value.
00094  */
00095 void DataSetUpdater::Update(int groupIndex, int setIndex, int row, int col, const string &value)
00096 {
00097         ofstream os(fileName.c_str(), ios::out | ios::binary | ios::in);
00098         SeekToPosition(os, groupIndex, setIndex, row, col);
00099         FileOutput::WriteString8(os, value);
00100         os.close();
00101 }
00102
